title: Corbyn Declares Anti-Zionist Stance
body: Jeremy Corbyn declares "absolute opposition to Zionism" at a Your Party gathering in London, aligning with MP Zarah Sultana, a long-time advocate for the stance.

title: Rav Yosef Meets Argentine President
body: Rav Dovid Yosef, Sephardi Chief Rabbi of Israel, met with Argentine President Javier Milei at the presidential palace in Buenos Aires, praising Milei's unwavering support for Israel during his official visit to Jewish communities.
